member.name: M:weatherApp.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: A summary of the weather forecast for a given location. Also provides the astronomy data for a given location and dateTime
member.param: The location you want to receive the weather and astronomy data for
The datetime you want for the astronomy in the format yyyy-MM-dd. Note this does not affect the weather forecast data.
A boolean to detemine the temperature format. True or null = Celcius, False = Fahrenheit
member.response: Returns a forecast summary of weather and astronomy data for the location specified.
Returns a forecast summary of weather for the location specified in order to be comptible with users of previous versions of this application
If there are multiple failure status codes from different parts of the request, returns a list of the errors.
If the request url is invalid or parameters are incorrect or no matching location found.
If the request is unauthorized e.g. apiKey is missing or invalid.
If the apiKey has has exceeeded usage limit or has been disabled.
